name: Rhum & Roll
description:
- THE GAME -

Rhum & Roll is a puzzle game inspired by the original gameboy style and color restrictions. In order to quench our mighty pirate's thirst, you must get the barrel out on the dock. 

However, this barrel is made of thin brittle wood, so you must be careful for each time you hit it on a box, the barrel will lose durability, and as you're surely aware, a destroyed barrel is free of any liquor !

Rhum & Roll is a game created in less than 4 days during the Godfather Jam organized by the digital school, IIM.

- KEY FEATURES -

-> A breakable barrel to handle

-> Original gameplay movement

-> Breakable puzzles for more tactics

-> Several success rates

-> A drunk Pirate in need of liquor !

- THE TEAM -

Art team : Mehdi Haffoudhi, Alma Griffoni
Programming team : Julien Dor, Enguerrand Cousin
Game Design team : Ayoub Ouahid, Arthur Joanin
Producing and Sound Design : Tianqi Chi
